name: Sylvan Fall Feast
text: Tribute 1 Plant-Type monster, excavate cards from the top of your Deck equal to the level of that monster, and send all excavated Plant-Type monsters to the GY. Otherwise, place them on the bottom of the Deck in any order. You can banish this card from the GY, except during the turn it was sent there: add 1 "Sylvan" spell from your GY to your hand.
